text: For the stone shall cry out of the wall, like Baalam's ass, and the purlin of timber shall creak in answer if the roof of our security is crushing our soul see Hab. knowledge of the Glory of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea. Hab. 2, 14. For the Stone shall cry out of the wall, like Baalam's ass and the purlin of timber shall creak in answer if the roof of our security is crushing our soul (see Hab. 2 10-11). And it is through the Shauir: That the earth shall be filled with the knowledge of the Glory of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea? (Hab. 2.14)
